Name: Topic_0
Representative_Docs:
['We need 4 more people to sign it so cannabis is legal in the uk 
I want to start a petition ‚Äì will you sign it?


Legalise marijuana for recreational use

Set up laws that allow smoking and digesting marijuana in recreational use and set up marijuana dispensaries

I believe marijuana has good impacts and is better than alcohol because marijuana has proven to help anxiety and other mental health disorders and it‚Äôs proven to make people less aggressive and alcohol does the opposite and in many religions marijuana is often used and many other countries have made it legal

Sign the petition here: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/724816/sponsors/new?token=taZtZAoEqvwv3HkBwhTu

Edit: I need 4 people to sign it so the government will be able to review it', 'Idaho House passed a resolution to amend the state constitution, stopping voters from legalizing marijuana through ballot initiatives. If the Senate agrees, Idahoans will vote in 2026 on whether only lawmakers can decide on psychoactive substances. A separate cannabis decrim effort is underway', 'Too Baked to Temp Step Your Vape? Let iOS Remind You If you‚Äôre staging or stepping up your vaping temperature during a session, it‚Äôs easy to get too baked and forget to bump it up. I made a customizable session timer using the iOS Shortcuts app ‚Äî it sends a notification **with sound** (volume depends on your system‚Äôs *‚ÄúSounds & Haptics‚Äù > ‚ÄúRingtone and Alerts‚Äù* setting).

The stopwatch also tracks the elapsed time since your last session. It records a lap at each temperature stage ‚Äî by default, **lap 4** triggers the ‚Äú*coughing/burnt*‚Äù notification.

[This app's output preview.](https://preview.redd.it/6i509ntpw5ve1.jpg?width=1290&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=730f01c034f219a9abbada7e22febf7aeb68cf9e)

# App modification (not prerequisites; skip to FAQ) --

The dictionary named "Temp Range" is used to configure the preheat timer (some users like to wait 5‚Äì15 seconds before hitting the bowl) and the temperature stages ‚Äî including draw time, exhale/rest time (in seconds), and the target temperature for each notification.

The last list **defines** the temperature stages **you‚Äôll be vaping at**, manually sorted from top to bottom in the desired order. Each notification will include a randomly selected quote from the list beneath that. The **final item in the list** is reserved for a separate notification, so please avoid using that row.

[Most customizing variables are grouped at the top of this app's \\"source code\\".](https://preview.redd.it/4z1evhgsw5ve1.jpg?width=1290&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=484acbdddd3755cd7bdc157327d0878ce986a83f)

# Predict FAQ? --

**Q1: I had Silent Mode on ‚Äî why were the notifications still so loud?**  
**A:** This shortcut *temporarily* disables Silent Mode until the session ends. If you want to **keep Silent Mode on**, simply delete the **two** code blocks in the shortcut that control Silent Mode.

**Q2: I don‚Äôt do temperature stepping. I just want something quieter at the end of my session ‚Äî the loud timer freaks me out. I also want to free up a hand to pause the alarm.**  
**A:** You can create a separate shortcut using stopwatch blocks arranged in sequential order. Then, use a combination of **‚ÄúWait X seconds‚Äù** and **‚ÄúShow Notification‚Äù** blocks instead of a loud timer. That way, you‚Äôll get a subtle reminder without the noise ‚Äî and you‚Äôll have a free hand to pause it if needed.

**Q3: I edited the app, but now it won‚Äôt run.**  
**A:** Double-check for any syntax errors or missing components ‚Äî the cross button is quite close to the edge, so you might have accidentally removed a block. Ensure all required blocks are properly linked and that the flow is intact. If everything seems in order but it's still not working, feel free to leave a comment *with the prefix \[Ques\],* and I‚Äôll try to help with that.

Download link: [https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/b32be173bcae40cc95050e2227fd574a](https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/b32be173bcae40cc95050e2227fd574a)

**Note**: You will need a stopwatch to record the inhale time for each temperature session. You simply lap the timer before exhaling, and after your rest (personal preference). Feel free to ask any questions in the comments.

I‚Äôve put a lot of time (and lung power) into tuning this shortcut. If you share or repost, kindly credit this post. FYI, I use a Solo 3 v1.0 with a medium-sized bong, and my temperature recipe is included with this app.']

Name: Topic_3
Representative_Docs:
['Need connoisseurs‚Äô help narrow it down. GOOROO, HYPNOSTATE or GG? I am buying for my bf, and I don‚Äôt know the first thing about bongs.

Avid GenX flower smoker, cleaning isn‚Äôt his favorite part of smoking, generally-speaking picky, his bong lives on the edge of a countertop and portability and price aren‚Äôt the criteria (within reason). 

I‚Äôve narrowed it down to GG, Hypnostate and GooRoo‚Ä¶ Which bong do I pick? 

**GG SWISS**: https://www.greekglassshop.com/product/swiss-2-0

**GG INLINE INVERT**: https://www.greekglassshop.com/product/gg-inline-invert-4

**GG DOUBLE DROP RECYCLER**: https://www.greekglassshop.com/product/gg-double-drop-recycler

**GG RECYCLER TUBE 2.0**: https://www.greekglassshop.com/product/recycler-tube

**GooRoo HD3**: https://www.goorooglass.com/store/p101/HD_3_piece_bubbler.html

**Atomic Barrel by Hypnostate**: https://www.badassglass.com/products/atomic-barrel-bong

ANNNNNDDD GOOOO! Thank you!', "How much water? New honeycomb perc. I'm honestly not impressed by it. The water goes above the honeycomb as I'm pulling so when I go to clear it the air pressure feels off and it doesn't really bubble. Am I doing something wrong?", 'New chamber finally arrived this morning Was given a new peak for christmas from my friend/dealer.  Finally got my 3g3dxl chamber for it in the mail this morning.   Highly recomend first hit was such a noticeable difference']

Name: Topic_2
Representative_Docs:
['Do you ‚Äúpack a bowl‚Äù when you pack a bowl?  If so, stop.  You‚Äôre killing me.  And your sesh. It seems like virtually everyone packs the weed down in their bowl.  If this is you, do yourself a favor.  Get some dank and a clean pipe.  Just put the weed in it, don‚Äôt compress it and take a hit.  

You taste that?   

Now smoke the rest of the bowl.  

You taste that?  
 
It‚Äôs not a competition to see how much you can fit in the bowl, let your weed breathe.

Your welcome üòÇ', 'When taking a ‚Äúcool‚Äù pic is more important than just doing the thing.', 'do you ever roll a joint, put it down, go to smoke it and youve rolled 2 with no memory of rolling one of them?? hahah']
